channel.title: Help

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

I’m customizing my quest tab and making a button that resets your task. It works perfectly except I need to make an exception where you can’t reset your task if you dont have one. Otherwise your quest ends up at -1. Where did I make a mistake with my exception? Lol

case 28172: // Reset Task
c.taskAmount = -1;
c.slayerTask = 0;
c.sendMessage(“Your task has been reset. Talk to Duradel for another one.”);
} else if (c.taskAmount = 0);
c.sendMessage(“You do not have a task to reset.”);
break;

EDIT:I THINK I GOT IT

case 28172: // Reset Task
c.taskAmount = -1;
c.slayerTask = 0;
c.sendMessage(“Your task has been reset. Talk to Duradel for another one.”);
if (c.taskAmount == 0);
c.taskAmount = 0;
break;

Read full topic
